New Records: Zach LaVine maintained a four-game streak of scoring at least 30 points, the longest of his career.
Key Match Events: Pascal Siakam led the Pacers with 26 points.
Thomas Bryant added a season-high 22 points and 8 rebounds.
Tyrese Haliburton had 16 points and 13 assists.
Indiana Pacers jumped out to a commanding 36-18 lead in the second quarter and extended their lead to as much as 34 points.
